sentences.en: colonic irrigation
sentences.cn: 结肠灌洗

sentences.en: How many man - days will be needed to construct this irrigation canal?
sentences.cn: 修这条渠道要多少人工?

sentences.en: In the United States, by contrast, 41% goes for agriculture, almost all of it for irrigation.
sentences.cn: 与之相比，美国全年41%的水投向了农业，并几乎全都用在了灌溉上。

sentences.en: irrigation channels
sentences.cn: 灌溉渠

sentences.en: Irrigation is easy in the South because of the abundance of water.
sentences.cn: 南方多水,利于灌溉.

sentences.en: Irrigation is important for farming.
sentences.cn: 灌溉对农业是非常重要的.

sentences.en: Irrigation is needed to make crops grow in dry regions.
sentences.cn: 干旱地区需要灌溉才能使作物生长.

sentences.en: Only when a reservoir is built here can we solve our irrigation problem.
sentences.cn: 除非在这里修个水库,才能解决灌溉问题.

sentences.en: Rivers and lakes provide us with water transport and irrigation.
sentences.cn: 江河湖泽给我们以舟楫和灌溉之利.

sentences.en: Small blockages or collapses of the canal would choke the intricate irrigation networks.
sentences.cn: 运河的小堵塞或倒塌都会阻塞整个负责的灌溉网络。

sentences.en: Spray irrigation sprinkling water over land to be used for crops. often used to dispose of wastewater from sewage treatment plants.
sentences.cn: 喷洒灌溉，喷灌把水喷洒于准备种植作物的土地上。常常使用经过污水厂处理过的废水。

sentences.en: The fields are crisscrossed by irrigation canals and ditches.
sentences.cn: 田野上沟渠纵横.

sentences.en: The set of opinion was toward building a new irrigation canal.
sentences.cn: 大家的意见倾向于修建一条新灌溉渠.

sentences.en: There are clear winners when a dam is built. Farmers get irrigation water, businesses get electricity.
sentences.cn: 大坝若是建成，会有一些明显的受益者：农民将得到灌溉用水，企业将得到电力。

sentences.en: There is a calculatedly abundant use of fertilizer and irrigation.
sentences.cn: 在经过周密计算之后充分使用肥料和灌溉.

sentences.en: There the irrigation canal links up with the reservoir.
sentences.cn: 这条灌溉渠在那里与水库连接起来.

sentences.en: They teamed up with the neighbouring communes on the irrigation project.
sentences.cn: 他们与邻近公社协作搞灌溉工程.

sentences.en: This irrigation canal has fallen into disuse.
sentences.cn: 这条渠荒废了.

sentences.en: This irrigation project requires a highly developed technical and interpretive expertise.
sentences.cn: 这项灌溉工程需要高度发展的技术和推理的专门知识.

sentences.en: We used the money to set up an irrigation project.
sentences.cn: 我们把钱用在兴建灌溉工程上了.

trans.tran_en: to supply water to an area of land through pipes or channels so that crops will grow
